title: EU carbon adjustment mechanism, transitional obligations
author: unknown
text: You need to enable JavaScript to run this app.
excerpt: The European Commission's first delegated act on the Carbon Border Adjustment Mechanism (CBAM) was published in the Official Journal of the EU on September 15. It is the Implementing Regulation 2023/1773, covering the mechanism's transitional period from October 1, 2023 to December 31, 2025 during which importers' obligations will be limited to reporting.
